title: Strict mode
contents:
mode_edit

嚴格模式link

Strict modelink

Angular CLI 建立所有新工作區和專案時會棄用嚴格模式。

Angular CLI creates all new workspaces and projects with strict mode enabled.

嚴格模式會增強可維護性，並且幫助你捕獲各種 AOT 的 BUG。另外，嚴格模式的應用還易於進行靜態分析，並且當你未來要升級到 Angular 的未來版本時，能幫助 ng update 命令的重構程式碼更加安全和精確。

Strict mode improves maintainability and helps you catch bugs ahead of time. Additionally, strict mode applications are easier to statically analyze and can help the ng update command refactor code more safely and precisely when you are updating to future versions of Angular.

具體來說，strict 標誌會在以下幾方面影響新產生的應用：

Specifically, strict mode affects newly generated applications in the following way:

  • 在 TypeScript 中啟用 strict 模式，以及 TypeScript 團隊建議的其他嚴格性標誌。具體而言，包括 forceConsistentCasingInFileNames、noImplicitReturns、noFallthroughCasesInSwitch。

    Enables strict mode in TypeScript, as well as other strictness flags recommended by the TypeScript team. Specifically, forceConsistentCasingInFileNames, noImplicitReturns, and noFallthroughCasesInSwitch.

  • 開啟 Angular 編譯器的嚴格性標誌 strictTemplates、strictInjectionParameters 和 strictInputAccessModifiers。

    Turns on strict Angular compiler flags strictTemplates, strictInjectionParameters, and strictInputAccessModifiers.

  • 相對於以前的預設值，把 initial 和 anyComponentStyle 的打包尺寸預算縮小了約 75％。

    Reduces the bundle size budgets for the initial and anyComponentStyle budget types by 75% compared to the previous defaults.

你可以在工作區一級和專案一級應用這些設定。

You can apply these settings at the workspace and project level.

使用基本的 ng new 命令建立新的工作空間和專案時，會自動使用嚴格模式，命令如下：

Using the basic ng new command to create a new workspace and application automatically uses strict mode, as in the following command:

ng new [project-name]

要在現有的非嚴格工作區內以嚴格模式建立新應用程式，請執行以下命令：

To create a new application in the strict mode within an existing non-strict workspace, run the following command:

ng generate application [project-name] --strict
